name: Ann BARATI v. Julius BARATI. Appeal of David J. BARATI, Intervenor

judges: Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
parties: Ann BARATI v. Julius BARATI. Appeal of David J. BARATI, Intervenor.

opinions.text:
PER CURIAM:
Decree affirmed. Costs to be borne by appellant.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Sidney Baker, Krause & Baker, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
J. G. Barati, in pro. per.
casebody.head_matter:
330 A.2d 841
Ann BARATI v. Julius BARATI. Appeal of David J. BARATI, Intervenor.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 10, 1974.
Decided Jan. 27, 1975.
Rehearing Denied April 3, 1975.
Sidney Baker, Krause & Baker, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
J. G. Barati, in pro. per.
Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
